results.name: Expansion of Jacobi theta function theta_4(q^2).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Jacobi Theta Functions
I. J. Zucker, Further Relations Amongst Infinite Series and Products. II. The Evaluation of Three-Dimensional Lattice Sums, J. Phys. A: Math. Gen. 23, 117-132, 1990.
mathematica: a[n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ EllipticTheta[4, 0, q^2], {q, 0, n}]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 101}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 12 2012 *)
